text: John Brown (June 11, 1937 â€“ March 2, 2022) was an American actor, comedian and singer. He was known for playing Nathan Bookman on the 1970s CBS sitcom, Good Times. Brown also appeared on The Flip Wilson Show, The Jeffersons, Family Matters, Sister, Sister, The Jamie Foxx Show, The Wayans Bros, and Martin. Brown died on March 2, 2022 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Florida Category:Singers from Florida Category:Comedians from Florida Category:People from St. Petersburg, Florida
title: Johnny Brown (actor)
